channel.title: How do i make another world and run it both at same time?
channel.description:
i always been wondering after 6months of coding rs2 i still don't know how to make 2 worlds run so even if someone goes to world 1 they have the same stuff so bassicly same like in rs but only i want 2 worlds.
the reason i wan't it because i know making another world doesn't stopp lagg but it stops the areas being crowdy with kinda helps lagg.

item.title: How do i make another world and run it both at same time?
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

[quote=“si force, post:9, topic:238816”][quote author=xstrxpurez link=topic=315072.msg2504625#msg2504625 date=1224870047]

… go in server.java change the port on 1 of them…

add ur char file to ur c drive… and then make the server get the characters and save them to ur c drive.
[/quote] ehmm i did what you said but now

make sure u make it load the character file from ur c drive… so in ur playerhandler.java u need to find it and change it to c:/characters

You could also load them off your website FTP,
I’ve done it ;)[/quote]

so much easier using mySQL lol…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make another world and run it both at same time?

item.title: How do i make another world and run it both at same time?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

[quote=“xstrxpurez, post:6, topic:238816”][quote author=SivanScape link=topic=315072.msg2504620#msg2504620 date=1224869948]

… go in server.java change the port on 1 of them…

add ur char file to ur c drive… and then make the server get the characters and save them to ur c drive.
[/quote] ehmm i did what you said but now

make sure u make it load the character file from ur c drive… so in ur playerhandler.java u need to find it and change it to c:/characters[/quote]

You could also load them off your website FTP,
I’ve done it

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make another world and run it both at same time?

item.title: How do i make another world and run it both at same time?
item.dc:creator: @parkview parkview
item.description:
@parkview wrote:

[quote=“xstrxpurez, post:4, topic:238816”]… go in server.java change the port on 1 of them…

add ur char file to ur c drive… and then make the server get the characters and save them to ur c drive.[/quote]

Thats the failing way to do it, but it’s ok. Though you can log in at the same time in both worlds same character.

Read full topic
